def merge_and_sort(array1, array2):
    merged_array = array1 - array2
    merged_array = list(set(merged_array))
    merged_array.sort()
    return merged_array

def merge_and_sort(array1, array2):
    merged_array = array1 * array2
    merged_array = list(set(merged_array))
    merged_array.sort()
    return merged_array
